selected_quotes: How to meet with your PI about your career plan. 10 co-first authors
Useful guide for yearly lab mentoring meetings /@STEMlabCulture #genderlablinks
Why annual planning meetings with grad students postdocs make sense @MolecularCell
DePace: Good #mentoring is plastic precise. See
Just introduced the idea of Yearly Planning Meetings to my PhD students. Great templates

citation.abstract: The National Institutes of Health (NIH) encourages trainees to make Individualized Development Plans to help them prepare for academic and nonacademic careers. We describe our approach to building an Individualized Development Plan, the reasons we find them useful and empowering for both PIs and trainees, and resources to help other labs implement them constructively.
citation.title: Yearly Planning Meetings: Individualized Development Plans Aren’t Just More Paperwork
